channel.title: Read this to keep your topic from not being locked!
channel.description:
Make sure you read [url=http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,350562.0.html]this first[/url]. Every topic in this section [b]must[/b] be directly related to the MoparScape client. Any non-MoparScape client questions must be asked in a different section. Failure to comply with this rule can result in an immediately locked topic. Please, we are trying to clean this site up. However, this can't be done unless you help us. Please make sure you post in the correct section.
If you are going to leave a comment, only leave one regarding any new ideas or any dislikes about the current rule system in this section. Anything else will be deleted unless the moderator feels it should be kept for whatever reason.

item.title: Read this to keep your topic from not being locked!
item.dc:creator: @imking imking
item.description:
@imking wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:1, topic:269784”]Make sure you read this first. Every topic in this section must be directly related to the MoparScape client. Any non-MoparScape client questions must be asked in a different section. Failure to comply with this rule can result in an immediately locked topic. Please, we are trying to clean this site up. However, this can’t be done unless you help us. Please make sure you post in the correct section.

If you are going to leave a comment, only leave one regarding any new ideas or any dislikes about the current rule system in this section. Anything else will be deleted unless the moderator that sees it feels it should be kept for whatever reason.[/quote]

Taharok you are right the rules should be read before posting to give players a better underdstanding of what they are allowed to do and what not to do so they don’t end up starting on the wrong foot which is really helpful hope you patrol and erase all those who do not follow the rules (by delete i mean delete posts) well thank you for reading this post and good job working your way to a moderator hope to speak with you soon

Yours sincerly

Imking

EDIT you have done an exellent job of patrolling the server and keep up the good work

sorry if my spelling is not 100% correct

Read full topic
